name: CASE_FLAGS
description: The CASE_FLAGS table holds the case flag information associated with the case records stored in the CASE_MGMT table. Each case record can have any number of flags assigned to it. This table stores every flag associated with each case record.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the case record that this flag is associated with.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the case flag that this row of information corresponds to. For instance, if the case has two flags, the first flag will have a Line value of 1 while the second will have a Line value of 2.

columns.name: FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number associated with the flag assigned to the case.
